verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Though troubles assail us and dangers affright, Though friends should all fail us and foes all unite, Yet one thing secures us, whatever betide, The promise assures us, “the Lord will provide.”{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When Satan assails us to stop up our path, And courage all fails us, we triumph by faith. He cannot take from us, though oft he has tired, This heart cheering promise, “the Lord will provide.”{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
